title: If you own multiple accounts. (Gifting Question)
body: I have two level 30 accounts and I wanted to make one my main so I refunded as much as I could on Account One tried to gift myself champions to Account Two. It never allowed me but everyone else on my friends list popped up saying they were available to gift to. Why is that not allowed?

replies.body: Thanks a lot for your quick responses. It was just weird because I went to add the two accounts together but they were already friends. I don't know how long but it had to have been longer than two weeks. I will let you know how things work when gifting is enabled again. Thanks a lot.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

We've actually updated gifting requirements, so your accounts will have to be friends for *one day* before you can send gifts between them. You can find our entire rundown on Gifting in our [FAQ/Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752964-Gifting-Guide-and-FAQ).

Let me know if you have any other questions.

In order to prevent account stealers from doing bad stuff immediately to accounts, there is a wait period of TWO-WEEKS after someone has been added to your friend list before you are able to gift them.

This stops scammers/phishers from doing just that: refunding stuff, getting RP, and then gifting their own main account free-stuff and also give the real account owner some potential time to get their account recovered.

After adding your own main to your friend list and two weeks have passed after that, you are able to freely gift your accounts from each other.
